mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_memo (title, content, pinned, deleted) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{pinned}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_memo SET deleted = 1 WHERE memo_id = #{memoId}
UPDATE tb_memo SET title = #{title} , content = #{content}, pinned = #{pinned} WHERE memo_id = #{memoId} AND deleted = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_memo WHERE title IS NULL AND content IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_memo WHERE (title IS NOT NULL or content IS NOT NULL) AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY pinned DESC, update_time DESC
